title: Do you Love AI?
description:
Do you Love AI, but not our Robot Overlords?

Then you should attend DataStax's "I Love AI" event on August 23rd.  Learn from top experts around the AI, ML, and Cassandra space.

https://dtsx.io/3QA9m6z

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra™. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world’s leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy’s, McDonald’s, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.

transcript.text: do you want to know the most terrifying thing about gen Ai No it's not the robot overlords and no it's not finding the bugs you'd hope no one would find in your code it's worse much much worse it's the mind-boggling amounts of data that will be created are you ready if you're not robot Warrior I have assembled people who have done this before and are ready to share the secrets Apache Cassandra has been working a petabyte scale for years and now with Vector search is a feature it will take you even years further than each other Shawn and Dad Aaron Morton these are all Apache Cassandra committers that not only know how to scale data they've helped build the database that's going to save your AI data bacon join us that's what we'll be talking about you'll leave with nothing but peace love and AI see you there
